Home Welcome home! Find shortcuts to your favorite pages, subpages, and trends right this way. You can customize your home to fit your needs. Welcome to Pages Your pages and subpages all hang out here until you need them. Welcome to Interactive Mode! If you\'re looking for new insights surrounding your data, you\'ll find it in Interactive Mode. Here you can drill, add filters, or access table data. Just rotate your device to see your charts in landscape view. Filters To see things in a new perspective, use a filter to customize your data. Date range Tap anywhere on the date range text above to view your chart\'s data during a specific time period. Welcome to Buzz! Have a private conversation or spread the good news. Buzz lets you chat with the right people whenever, wherever. Notifications ‘Buzz’ and ‘Projects and Tasks’ notifications show up here. Tap any of these to jump to that topic. Nice and neat Here in Projects & Tasks your work is nicely laid out for you. Create, assign, and organize your projects and tasks in one place. Find your people Access your company\'s directory here.
Buzz Navigation Menu This is where all of your channels and private chats reside. If something is happening, this is where you\'ll find it. Slash Commands Type a forward slash (/) to open the list of possible commands. Create a Chat Find and create private 1:1 or group chats with team members. Create thread from message You can also turn another person\'s posted comment into a thread for further discussion. Just long press on their comment and select "Create thread from message." Reply as Thread You can also turn another person\'s posted comment into a thread for further discussion. Just tap on their comment and select "Reply as a Thread." Congrats! You added your first reaction! To undo your reaction, just tap it again. Notifications Somebody mentioned you! Follow the red indicators to find the comment. Channels Channels are public conversations, or conversations about your cards and pages. Private Chats are conversations with a single person or a group. You can create new conversations by clicking the \'+\' button. Long Press to Unfollow Hiding a chat or unfollowing a channel will remove it from your Navigation Menu so you will no longer receive updates for unread activity. Privacy Settings Threads can also be private. Just click on the toggle and select who you want to add. Only the people you have added will be able to view this content.
